title: PopCult
description: A site for film & series lovers!
admin_reports_description: Here you can see every report sent and accept or decline them.
admin_bans_description: Here you can see and manage every banned user.
admin_mods_description: Here you can see every active moderator and requests made to become a moderator as well.
profile_description: Or as we like to call you: <0>{{username}}</0>
settings_description: Or as we like to call you:
settings_image_error:
It seems that your image is too big,
or for some reason can't be uploaded at the moment.
Please try again.
username_error:
Valid usernames contain between 1 and 20
non special characters.
name_error:
Valid names contain between 3 and 20
non special characters.
login_sign_up: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login_error: Incorrect username or password. Please, try again.
register_email_validation:
Please insert a valid email. 
For example: something@example.com
register_password_error: Please insert a valid password. Tap ? for more details
register_password_hint:
Your password must be 8-20 characters long,
contain letters and numbers, and must not contain
spaces, special characters, or emoji.
register_username_error: Valid usernames contain between 1 and 20 non special characters.
register_name_error: Valid names contain between 3 and 20 non special characters.
register_error: Please make sure that all mandatory* fields are filled in correctly.
register_username_exists: It seems this username is already in use
register_email_exists: It seems this email is already in use
user_panel_requests_detail: See all the requests from people who wish to collaborate in your lists
user_panel_comments_detail: See everything that was discussed in your lists comment section
user_lists_title: Every list you can edit and collaborate in!
user_lists_empty: You don't seem to have any lists to show! :c
modal_user_delete_body: Are you sure you wish to permanently delete your user?
modal_user_delete_success: Your account has been successfully deleted. You will be redirected to Home soon.
modal_user_delete_error: There has been an error with your request. This one is on us. Please try again later.
welcome_body:
Thanks for choosing us! An email will be sent to your inbox for you to verify and start using you account. We hope you enjoy everything PopCult has to offer! 

See you soon!
The PopCult Team.
expiredToken_title: It seems your token has expired
expiredToken_body: Please, remember us your email down below so we can send you a new authentication token.
expiredToken_emailError: It seems this email does not match any of our users emails. Are you sure this is your email?
expiredToken_greet:
See you soon!
The PopCult Team
banned_users_empty: It seems there are no banned users to show
moderators_request_empty: It seems there are no moderation requests to show
moderators_active_empty: It seems that currently there are no PopCult Moderators
moderator_accept_body: Are you sure you want to accept {{username}} as a moderator?
moderator_reject_body: Are you sure you want to reject {{username}} from being a moderator?
moderator_remove_body: Are you sure you want to quit {{username}} moderator access?
report_reject_modal_body: Are you sure you want to reject this report?
report_accept_modal_body: Are you sure you want to approve this report?
reports_lists_empty: It seems there are no lists reported at the moment
reports_lists_comments_empty: It seems there are no list comments reported at the moment
reports_media_comments_empty: It seems there are no media comments reported at the moment
